results.query: Sunset Jazz Concert Series at Hudson River Park Pier 45 featuring local jazz bands Hudson River Park Pier 45 Jazz Concert New York City 2025

results.title: Sunset Jazz Concerts 2025 | Lyndhurst Mansion
results.content:
Sunset Jazz is back for the 2025 season! Presented by Jazz Forum Arts, the 15th year of this concert series kicks off July 10th and runs through August 28th on the west lawn overlooking the Hudson River.

Please purchase your  Lyndhurst Jazz Access Pass in advance to secure your parking space and receive advance notice of any cancellations. It also helps get you through the gate faster! Limited day-of-event passes are available at the Lyndhurst gate as space permits. [...] #### Historic Buildings

#### Membership & Support

# Sunset Jazz Concerts 2025

Thursdays, July 10th - August 28th, 2025

$10/per person Lyndhurst Jazz Access Pass fee  
 Children under 10 free

In the event of rain cancellation, please check Lyndhurst’s and Jazz Forum Arts’ Facebook pages. Rain cancellations are made by 2 pm on the day of the concert. [...] Dogs are allowed on leash only. Please clean up after your dog.

Parking in designated Jazz Concert parking areas only.

There is no adjacent parking on residential streets outside of Lyndhurst for visitors to use and walk onto our grounds!

Grounds open at 4:00 pm and the show starts at 6:30 pm.

Guests are asked to leave the property promptly when the concert is over.

results.title: Jazz @ Pier 84 & Sunset on the Hudson @ Pier 45 - Time Out
results.content:
Free jazz along the waterfront couldn’t get any more enticing. This summer the Jazz Foundation of America will perform at Pier 84 while local artists will be performing on Pier 45. The lineup at Pier 84 includes George Braith, Art Baron and Gregory Lewis Organ Monk Trio. The Sunset on the Hudson lineup features the Chuck Braman Jazz Band, Max Gallico & Friends Acoustic Soul Duos and Shanti Star & the Afro-Reggae All-Stars. Catch live jazz along with a beautiful sunset along the Hudson. [...] New York

New York

# Jazz @ Pier 84 & Sunset on the Hudson @ Pier 45

results.title: Hudson River Park Announces 2025 Spring/Summer Lineup
results.content:
Riverfront Rhythms – Broadway By The Boardwalk brings the excitement of top-notch Broadway talent performing a mix of original music, personal favorites and Broadway staples for free, at Clinton Cove. The crowd-favorite series, Jazz at Pier 84, in partnership with the Jazz Foundation of America, returns with star-studded musicians bringing smooth tunes to the Park at sunset. Pier 45 will host a special celebration of Juneteenth curated by the talented Ladies of Hip Hop while The Bad Judies and [...] Soak up sunset sounds at Hudson River Park’s brand-new Pier 97, as the Jazz Foundation of America brings NYC’s finest blues and roots musicians to the riverfront. Bring a blanket and lose yourself in the groove.

August & September

Blues BBQ Festival

Saturday, August 16 | 1:00–9:00 PM | Pier 76 At W 34 St. [...] Jazz at Pier 84

Wednesdays, June 11-August 13 | 7:00 PM | Pier 84

Local legends play outdoors for free in a spectacular riverfront setting – what could be better? Combining smooth tunes with beautiful Hudson River evenings, these shows are unlike any other in Manhattan. Presented by the Jazz Foundation of America.

Big City Fishing

Thursdays, June 12–August 21 | 3:00–6:00 PM | Pier 26 At N Moore St.

Saturdays, June 14–August 23 | 11:00 AM–3:00 PM | Pier 51 At Jane St.

results.title: 50+ Free Outdoor Summer Concerts In NYC: Full 2025 List
results.content:
With breathtaking views of Hudson River sunsets as a backdrop this, refreshing waterfront breezes spot will welcome the very best of Global and American folk, roots and blues music. ### Receive Summer on the Hudson updates:

To get the latest news and updates about Summer on the Hudson events, subscribe to the Summer on the Hudson email list. The sign-up prompt is located at the bottom of the page.

### We Want to Hear from You

Did you attend one of our events this year? Tell us a bit about your Summer on the Hudson experience by taking our online survey.

results.title: Pier 45 - Hudson River Park
results.content:
Amenities on this 900-foot-long pier include a promenade, artful shade structures, spray showers, seating areas, wood decking and an expansive grass lawn. Known as the green beach by day during the summer, Pier 45 hosts free Sunset on the Hudson concerts during the Park’s programming season. What’s better than enjoying music and dancing along the water’s edge?

Image 4: Sunset Salsa participants partner up and dance around under the canopy at sunset on Hudson River Park's Pier 45 [...] ### Useful Links

results.title: Dance Is Life at Hudson River Park's Pier 45
results.content:
We are also excited to welcome guest DJ, Diyanna Monet (@diyannamonet)! [...] ### We grow together. We make mistakes. We forgive. We stay rooted in our purpose: to create space where everyone can move freely, feel joy deeply, and be their full, radiant selves. [...] #### Gossip, exclusion, or shaming have no place here. We give each other the benefit of the doubt, while still upholding boundaries that protect our collective well-being. If conflict arises, we approach it with care and seek resolution, not punishment.

#### 

### Harm Has Consequences

results.answer: The Sunset Jazz Concert Series at Hudson River Park Pier 45 features local jazz bands in 2025. Concerts run July 10 to August 28. Tickets are $10 per person.
